name: kaabah
description: A Terraform solution to build and operate Docker Swarm infrastructures

scripts.release:major: npm run changelog -- -M && git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit -m "updated CHANGELOG.md" && npm version --force major
scripts.release:minor: npm run changelog -- -m && git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit -m "Updated CHANGELOG.md" && npm version --force minor
scripts.release:patch: npm run changelog -- -p && git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit -m "Updated CHANGELOG.md" && npm version --force patch
